name: Doice 2 Meet You
description:
This game was made in 24 hours (due to starting late) for the GMTK game jam. 

I have never tried making turn-based games before but over the past year of learning game dev I had a few ideas about how to do it, and this game jam was the perfect opportunity for it.

This was based on games like The Oregon Trail. I liked the RNG elements to them and made it my own.

As stated in the readMe I ran very short on time, so I had to drop a bunch of features; but I'm happy with how it came out! Enjoy.
